data.persona: I will one day rule the entire kingdom. I love my family but do not wish to marry the princess from Spain. I dislike the color purple.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar.
This place is made from oak wood. It is very small due to the wood aisles. The front of the store has a big wooden table as well as a scale.
There's an aisle, a gold bar, an oak wood, an a scale, a coin, and a big wooden table here.
The visitor and the villager are here.

You are carrying a weapon and a sword, wearing a clothes, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: Tell the villager to kill the princess from Spain
data.mid_motivation: Get my parents to reconsider the wedding
data.long_motivation: Get my freedom from the royal family
